name: Gumienniki
movement: 30 ft. walking speed, doubled speed in grassy areas
description: The Gumienniki is a small, agile fiend with the ability to change into a Tiny housecat, which enhances its stealth and evasion capabilities.
memorable: Its ability to shape-shift and blind opponents through its Fiendish Blink makes it a unique threat.
goals: Often seeks to manipulate and disrupt opponents while remaining elusive.
relations: Related to other fiendish creatures and often encountered with malevolent entities.
environment: Typically found in dark, hidden spaces, often in grassy or rural areas.
strengths: High Dexterity enhances its acrobatics and stealth, making it hard to hit.
weaknesses: Low hit points and weaker in close combat due to lower Strength and Constitution.
attacks: Uses a Flaming Hand Scythe to deliver slashing and fire damage.
most_powerful_ability: Fiendish Blink can blind creatures, significantly reducing their combat effectiveness.
senses: Possesses darkvision with a range of 60 feet.
skills: Highly skilled in acrobatics and stealth, both at +5.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and resistant to cold, fire, and lightning.
Can double its speed in grassy terrains.
Taunting Cackle reduces enemy effectiveness after a miss.
Shapechanger ability allows it to transform into a housecat.
Has average Wisdom, making it vulnerable to deception.
test_queries: small fiend that can transform into a cat
agile monster with fire damage attacks
monster that taunts opponents after missing attacks
